fullplot: A 14-year-old pretends to go on a ski trip, but actually spends the week in isolation in his basement, escaping society's pressure. When his 25-year-old half-sister enters the basement, a few emotional and confronting days and nights ensue.
plot: An introverted teenager tells his parents he is going on a ski trip, but instead spends his time alone in a basement.
title: Me and You

tomatoes.consensus: A minor entry in a magnificent filmography, Me and You doesn't stand with Bertolucci's greatest works, but it's still an engaging character study.

writers: Niccolè Ammaniti (based on the novel by)
